00066 MapDialog::MapDialog( QWidget *parent )
00067    : QDialog(parent)
00068 {
00069         QDir directory( qApp->applicationDirPath() );
00070         directory.cd( "data" );
00071         
00072         std::cout<<directory.absolutePath().toStdString()<<std::endl;
00073          
00074         MarbleDirs::setMarbleDataPath( directory.absolutePath() );
00075         
00076     setWindowTitle(tr("Marble - Desktop Globe"));
00077 
00078     resize( 680, 500 );
00079         
00080         QVBoxLayout* vlayout = new QVBoxLayout( );
00081         vlayout->setMargin( 0 );
00082         setLayout( vlayout );
00083         
00084         m_splitter = new QSplitter( this );
00085         vlayout->addWidget( m_splitter );
00086         
00087         //ControlWidget
00088         QWidget* controlWidget = new QWidget;
00089         m_splitter->addWidget( controlWidget );
00090         
00091         QVBoxLayout* tabLayout = new QVBoxLayout( );
00092         controlWidget->setLayout(tabLayout );
00093         
00094         QTabWidget* tabWidget = new QTabWidget( this );
00095         tabLayout->addWidget( tabWidget );
00096         
00097         //Position Tab
00098     QWidget* currentLocationWidget = new QWidget;
00099     tabWidget->addTab( currentLocationWidget, "Current Location" );
00100     
00101     QVBoxLayout* locationLayout = new QVBoxLayout;
00102     currentLocationWidget->setLayout( locationLayout );
00103     
00104     QLabel* latLabel = new QLabel( "Latitude" );
00105     locationLayout->addWidget( latLabel );
00106     
00107     QHBoxLayout* latLayout = new QHBoxLayout;
00108     locationLayout->addLayout( latLayout );
00109    
00110     m_latSpinBox = new QDoubleSpinBox;
00111     latLayout->addWidget( m_latSpinBox );
00112     m_latSpinBox->setMinimumSize(QSize(82, 0));
00113     m_latSpinBox->setDecimals(4);
00114     m_latSpinBox->setMaximum(90);
00115     
00116     m_latComboBox = new QComboBox;
00117     m_latComboBox->insertItems(0, QStringList()
00118      << "N"
00119      << "S" );
00120     latLayout->addWidget( m_latComboBox );
00121     
00122     QSpacerItem* spacerItem = new QSpacerItem(0, 20, QSizePolicy::Expanding, QSizePolicy::Minimum);
00123     latLayout->addItem( spacerItem );
00124     
00125     QLabel*  lonLabel = new QLabel( "Longitude" );
00126     locationLayout->addWidget( lonLabel );
00127     
00128     QHBoxLayout* lonLayout = new QHBoxLayout;
00129     locationLayout->addLayout( lonLayout );
00130    
00131     m_lonSpinBox = new QDoubleSpinBox;
00132     m_lonSpinBox->setMinimumSize(QSize(82, 0));
00133     m_lonSpinBox->setDecimals(4);
00134     m_lonSpinBox->setMaximum(180);
00135     lonLayout->addWidget( m_lonSpinBox );
00136     
00137     m_lonComboBox = new QComboBox;
00138     m_lonComboBox->insertItems(0, QStringList()
00139      << "E"
00140      << "W" );
00141     lonLayout->addWidget( m_lonComboBox );
00142     
00143     QSpacerItem* spacerItem2 = new QSpacerItem(0, 20, QSizePolicy::Expanding, QSizePolicy::Minimum);
00144     lonLayout->addItem( spacerItem2 );
00145         
00146         QSpacerItem* verticalSpacer = new QSpacerItem(20, 0, QSizePolicy::Minimum, QSizePolicy::Expanding);
00147     locationLayout->addItem( verticalSpacer );
00148     
00149         //Control Tab
00150     m_control = new MarbleControlBox( this );
00151     m_control->setLegendTabShown( false );
00152     tabWidget->addTab( m_control, "Control" );
00153     
00154     //Dialog buttons
00155     QDialogButtonBox* buttons = new QDialogButtonBox(QDialogButtonBox::Ok | QDialogButtonBox::Cancel);
00156         connect( buttons, SIGNAL( accepted() ), this, SLOT( accept() ) );
00157         connect( buttons, SIGNAL( rejected() ), this, SLOT( reject() ) );
00158     tabLayout->addWidget( buttons );
00159     
00160     //Marble Widget
00161     m_marbleWidget = new MarbleWidget( this );
00162     m_marbleWidget->setSizePolicy( QSizePolicy( QSizePolicy::MinimumExpanding, QSizePolicy::MinimumExpanding ) );
00163     m_marbleWidget->setMinimumZoom( m_control->minimumZoom() );
00164         m_control->addMarbleWidget( m_marbleWidget );
00165     m_splitter->addWidget( m_marbleWidget );
00166     
00167     m_splitter->setSizes( QList<int>() << 180 << width()-180 );
00168     m_splitter->setStretchFactor(m_splitter->indexOf(m_control), 0);
00169     m_splitter->setStretchFactor(m_splitter->indexOf(m_marbleWidget), 1);
00170 
00171     connect( m_marbleWidget, SIGNAL( mouseClickGeoPosition( double, double, GeoPoint::Unit ) ), this, SLOT( changeGpsPosition( double, double, GeoPoint::Unit ) ) );
00172 }
00173 
00174 void MapDialog::GetCoordinates( double* lon, double* lat ) const
00175 {
00176         *lon = m_longitude;
00177         *lat = m_latitude;
00178 }
00179 
00180 void MapDialog::SetCoordinates(  double lon, double lat )
00181 {
00182         m_longitude = lon;
00183         m_latitude = lat;
00184         
00185         changeGpsPosition( m_longitude, -m_latitude, GeoPoint::Radian );
00186         m_control->receiveGpsCoordinates( m_longitude, -m_latitude, GeoPoint::Radian );
00187 }

00192 }

00210 {
00211     m_marbleWidget->moveUp();
00212 }
00213 
00214 void MapDialog::moveDown()
00215 {
00216     m_marbleWidget->moveDown();
00217 }
00218 
00219 void MapDialog::changeGpsPosition( double lon, double lat, GeoPoint::Unit )
00220 {
00221         Trace trace( "MapDialog::changeGpsPosition", false );
00222         
00223         // Gps Position Coordinates are positive for south and east
00224         
00225         m_longitude = lon;
00226         if( m_longitude < 0 ) m_lonComboBox->setCurrentIndex( 1 );
00227         else m_lonComboBox->setCurrentIndex( 0 );
00228         m_lonSpinBox->setValue( abs( m_longitude * ( 180 / tgc::Pi ) ) );
00229         
00230         m_latitude = -lat;
00231         if( m_latitude < 0 ) m_latComboBox->setCurrentIndex( 1 );
00232         else m_latComboBox->setCurrentIndex( 0 );
00233         
00234         m_latSpinBox->setValue( abs( m_latitude * ( 180 / tgc::Pi ) ) );
00235 }
